review:
*** ** *** **** *** * **** ********** ***** Genuine, compasionet, listens to you and has no ego of his knowledge. He knows his job and you feel you are in safe hands.

I was made comfortable and safe. He was detailed in his expression, words were not intidimating nor were they shallow or ambiguous

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He has the thoughtfulness to understand, evaluate and prescribe medicines in the shortest  available time. We have been taking Medicines prescribed by him for my father for over a Period of 15 years successfully. Most reliable Cardiac doctor in Delhi we have known. God Bless him and his loved ones.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ****** ****** ** ** ********* ******* We have been visiting him for over 7 years now and his diagnosis, patience and friendly behaviour is commendable.
He is one of the rarest doctors in India whom you can trust completely.
I highly recommend this doctor for cardio related problems.
A Doctor with a gem of a heart *** ******** ********* ** *** ******* , Dr Bhalla is a savior to many Heart patients. Strongly Reccomended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very calm , gives detailed explanation , no unnecessary medicines , friendly,  Also does not asks to come back for follow up quickly , gives sufficient time gaps
Dr  was polite,listened to the problem and gave satisfactory reply to each question , and advised me accordingly.
